Articles.Content:
Are you good in image-editing/compositing? If you have the skills in Photoshop or GIMP or any image-editing program, this might just be the challenge to show your PR/marketing skills!

The challenge is quite simple. People here have their respective "companies". **You just have to design a poster for recruiting** **unsuspecting** **kerbals to join your "company"**. Something like "Sign up now for our very first trip to Eve! [return not guaranteed]", or maybe something like "Uncle Gene wants you!", or maybe "Join the <x company=""> engineering team today and get a free snack!"</x>.

MECHANICS:

- There are no specific dimensions for the poster itself but portrait orientation is preferred.
- Make it as compelling as possible! Choice of words might just be the key to a more "believable" poster.
- Quality is top priority. Don't just whip something up in paint... please ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

GET DESIGNING AND POST! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Good challenge! I'll put an entry soon.

I'm no artist, but I love this challenge! Can't wait to see what folks come up with ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
